movies.title: Belle
movies.plot: BELLE is inspired by the true story of Dido Elizabeth Belle, the illegitimate mixed race daughter of a Royal Navy Admiral. Raised by her aristocratic great-uncle Lord Mansfield and his wife, Belle's lineage affords her certain privileges, yet the color of her skin prevents her from fully participating in the traditions of her social standing. Left to wonder if she will ever find love, Belle falls for an idealistic young vicar's son bent on change who, with her help, shapes Lord Mansfield's role as Lord Chief Justice to end slavery in England

movies.title: Churchill
movies.plot: A ticking-clock thriller following Winston Churchill in the 24 hours before D-Day.

movies.title: Kajaki
movies.plot: British soldiers guarding the Kajaki Dam set out to rescue a three-man team after one of them loses a leg to a landmine.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 4 wins & 6 nominations.
